author: Team Social
title: ‘Channa Mereya’ has dominated the music charts across the country sinc
text:
‘Channa Mereya’ has dominated the music charts across the country since the release of Ae Dil Hai Mushkil. The song, voiced by Arijit Singh, is the perfect combination of melody and symphony.
But just when you thought the song was perfect as it is. Here comes, Toronto-based tabla player Shobit Banwait .
His latest version of ‘Channa Mereya’ is winning the internet. The tabla rendition of the soulful song is definitely going to leave you wanting for more.
Happy listening!
